To earn Kris+ miles  you need to use Kris+ app. Within Kris+ app  it links to Apple Pay.It is two different routing paths.1). Kris+ app -> Apple Pay -> Credit card2). Apple watch -> Apple Pay -> Credit card.U need to use camera to scan Kris+ QR code to earn Kris+ miles. There is no camera on iWatch to scan QR code.
